Record.ParentTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmaceutical Product-related Substance
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: Molecular variants of the desired biological product formed during manufacture and/or storage, which are active and have no deleterious effect on the safety and efficacy of the drug substance or drug product. These variants possess properties comparable to the desired product and are not considered impurities.
